entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to periods of rain or snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
